column1: (!) Don't forget to use the reference in your payment. Without the reference the processing of your payment can take more time!
column2: (!) Glem ikke at bruge referencen i din betaling. Uden referencen kan behandlingen af din betaling tage længere tid!
Beløbene stemmer ikke overens. Mulig svindel

column1: Especially for Developers you can enable the Debug mode.
column2: Især for udviklere kan du aktivere fejlsøgningstilstand.

column1: You can limit the availability to specific IP adressess, for instance for testing purposes (example: 128.0.0.1, 255.255.255.255). If you leave this empty the payment method will be available to all IP addresses.
column2: Du kan begrænse tilgængeligheden til specifikke IP-adresser, for eksempel til testformål (eksempel: 128.0.0.1, 255.255.255.255). Hvis du lader dette være tomt, vil betalingsmetoden være tilgængelig for alle IP-adresser.

column1: Fill in your API Key below.
column2: Kopier API-nøglen til din webshop fra din forhandlerportal.
Generer en faktura for en vellykket transaktion

column1: Include Webhook URL with every order creation
column2: Angiv automatisk webhook URL med hver genereret ordre til NoPayn PSP API.

column1: NoPayn PSP - Mastercard, VISA, Maestro of V PAY
column2: NoPayn PSP - Mastercard, VISA, Maestro eller V PAY

column1: No order found for transaction id %1

column2: Løser problem når curl.cacert-stien ikke er angivet i PHP.ini

column1: Set the notification for to Notify the customer with the Invoice
column2: Send en faktura-e-mail til din kunde

column1: Set the order status before the customer is redirected to Payment Gateway
column2: Indstil ordrestatus, før kunden omdirigeres til betalingsgateway

column1: Set the order status for Completed Payments

column2: Din ordre er blevet placeret med succes. Tak for din bestilling!

column1: There was an error checking the transaction status.
column2: Der opstod en fejl ved kontrol af transaktionsstatus.

column1: There was a problem processing your payment because it expired. Please try again.
column2: Der opstod et problem med at behandle din betaling, fordi den udløb. Prøv venligst igen.

column1: There was a problem processing your payment because it failed. Please try again.
column2: Der opstod et problem med at behandle din betaling, fordi den mislykkedes. Prøv venligst igen.

column1: There was a problem processing your payment because it has been cancelled. Please try again.
column2: Der opstod et problem med at behandle din betaling, fordi den er blevet annulleret. Prøv venligst igen.

column1: When activated the debug file will be located in: var/log/gingerpay/debug.log
column2: Når fejlsøgningsindstillingerne er aktiveret, vil fejlsøgningsfilen være placeret i: var/log/nopayn

column1: Your order has been received. Thank you for your purchase! We will dispatch your order as soon as possible. For any questions, please contact our customer support.
column2: Din ordre er modtaget. Tak for dit køb! Vi afsender din ordre så hurtigt som muligt. For eventuelle spørgsmål, kontakt venligst vores kundesupport.

column1: API Key is not valid: NoPayn Online payment methods deactivated
column2: API-nøgle er ikke gyldig: NoPayn betalingsmetoder deaktiveret

column1: Some payments will be missing. To use them, set %1 in Stores -> Configuration -> General -> Currency setup
column2: "Nogle betalinger vil mangle. For at bruge dem
column3: indstil %1 i Butikker -> Konfiguration -> Generelt -> Valutaopsætning"

column1: Set the order status for Authorized Payments
Enable to authorize payment first, then capture after invoice is sent
column3: derefter indfang efter faktura er sendt"

column1: NoPayn helps entrepreneurs with the best, smartest and most efficient payment systems.
column2: NoPayn hjælper iværksættere med de bedste, smarteste og mest effektive betalingssystemer.
